InterfaceReactor.Title: Main Nuclear Reactor
InterfaceReactor.Texte: Press to turn on the reactor

NiveauPlaineRiviere.SeePNJ: Look at your map and try to find usefull informations.
NiveauPlaineRiviere.LearnCrossBridge: Go trough the way made by the Lumberjack.
NiveauPlaineRiviere.BuildBridge: Use the planks given by the traveller to cross the river.
NiveauPlaineRiviere.MineRock: Find a way out, you'll need to clean it.

NiveauMedievale.SeePNJ: Look at your map and try to find usefull informations.
NiveauMedievale.BuildBridge: Gather wood and find a way straight to the village.
NiveauMedievale.FindWell: This guard won't let you go, you can still find a way in the castle by crafting a boat near the well.
NiveauMedievale.PlaceBoat: Go to the river to place your boat.
NiveauMedievale.NavigateBoat: Use your boat to enter in the castle.
NiveauMedievale.OpenPortail: Use the summoner's circle to reopen the gate.

NiveauBaseFuturiste.SeePNJ2: Find someone able to turn on the reactor.
NiveauBaseFuturiste.SeePNJ3: Now that the whole base is open, find a way to leave : Find a pilot and a spaceship with fuel.
NiveauBaseFuturiste.SeePNJ4: Find Han in the launch room and get ready for takeoff.
NiveauBaseFuturiste.SeePNJ5: Tell Han where you wanna go.
NiveauBaseFuturiste.SeePNJ6: Go check if Han is fine.
NiveauBaseFuturiste.Electricity: Go to the reactor's control panel and turn it back on.
NiveauBaseFuturiste.UseVent: It seems that there is a vent going to the reactor room.
NiveauBaseFuturiste.EscapeVaisseau: Han is knocked down, go out and try to find a way to leave this place.

NiveauMordor.SeePNJ: Look at your map and try to find usefull informations.
NiveauMordor.PotParchemin: Search your cell for anything that could help to escape.
NiveauMordor.OpenDoorCellule: Find your way out of the prison.
NiveauMordor.SeePNJ2avant: Free the other prisoner and take down that orc.
NiveauMordor.OpenDoorPrison: You need to open the castle's door.
NiveauMordor.OpenVolcan: Go to see the king in the volcano.

NiveauPlaineRiviere.Cinematique1End: The Lumberkacj has chopped down the tree, you can now cross the river !

NiveauMedievale.Cinematique1End: The king fleed trough the gate, use the summoner's circle and a spell to open it back.
NiveauMedievale.CantTraverserPont: The guard is in front of the bridge, he won't let you go in the castle.
NiveauMedievale.RemoveSouche: You just removed a tree stump.
NiveauMedievale.NeedPlanks: You need 3 planks to build a boat.
NiveauMedievale.PlaceBoat: You just put the boat on the river.
NiveauMedievale.UseBoat: You navigate on the river and end in the castle.
NiveauMedievale.UseBoat2: You navigate on the river and get out of the castle.
NiveauMedievale.GetCours: A scroll was on the workbench, you pick it up.
NiveauMedievale.OpenPortail: You need to reopen the gate.
NiveauMedievale.MakeExo: To reopen this gate, solve that exercise.

DifficulteTrue.Consigne: Using the given values, please calculate the total volume of the figure shown below:

DifficulteFalse.Consigne: Using the given values, please calculate the required volume of: The cube with side length c, the sphere with radius r, the cone with height h and base diameter d.

DifficulteTrue.Consigne: You need to find the possible solution(s) of P(x) = 0, if any, rounded to two decimal places :

DifficulteFalse.Consigne: You need to find the possible solution(s) of P(x) = 0, if any, rounded to two decimal places :

NiveauBaseFuturiste.UseVent: You cross the base through the ventilation ducts.
NiveauBaseFuturiste.MakeExo: To get out, solve that exercise.
NiveauBaseFuturiste.PiloteMoveCafet: The pilot went into the launch room, you can go find him.
NiveauBaseFuturiste.CrashVaisseau: The ship has crashed, check out for Han.
NiveauBaseFuturiste.ExplosionReacteur: You sent too much power in the reactor, it exploded.

NiveauMordor.KillRoi: You push the king into the lava.
NiveauMordor.MakeExo: To go into that volcano, solve that exercise.
NiveauMordor.GoPrison: The orc is not really friendly, you end up in a cell.
NiveauMordor.ParcheminVu: You have already picked that scroll.
NiveauMordor.Key: You search through the chamber pot and find keys.
NiveauMordor.Key2: You search trough the chamber pot, there is nothing anymore.
NiveauMordor.OpenDoorCellule: You just opened the cell's door.
NiveauMordor.KillPNJ3: You have won the fight, you can now go out.
NiveauMordor.LeavePNJ2: Your friend continue by his own way.

DifficulteTrue.Consigne: You need to solve that equation with 2 unknowns

DifficulteFalse.Consigne: You need to solve that equation with 2 unknowns

DifficulteTrue.Consigne: A sailboat is in the port of S√®te, and before departing, a client wants to know the volume of oil the ship can carry, given that it has a cargo of 85 barrels with length 'a' and width 'b' (we assume the barrels used have completely straight sides and are not rounded). After that, the boat sets sail and receives information about another boat traveling at the same speed. Determine if the two boats will cross paths. Furthermore, boat b1 is currently at point A and is traveling in the direction (AB). Similarly, boat b2 is currently at point C and is traveling in the direction (CD). Coordinates:

DifficulteFalse.Consigne: A sailboat is in the port of S√®te, and before departing, a client wants to know the volume of oil the ship can carry, given that it has a cargo of 85 barrels with length 'a' and width 'b' (we assume the barrels used have completely straight sides and are not rounded). After that, the boat sets sail and receives information about another boat traveling at the same speed. Determine if the two boats will cross paths. Furthermore, boat b1 is currently at point A and is traveling in the direction (AB). Similarly, boat b2 is currently at point C and is traveling in the direction (CD). Coordinates:

DifficulteTrue.Consigne: You need to find the common ratio of this sequence and calculate the sum of the first 'n' terms.

DifficulteFalse.Consigne: You need to find the common ratio of this sequence and calculate the sum of the first 'n' terms.

DifficulteTrue.Consigne: A manufacturer is considering the production of cardboard milk cartons. Initially, he has a square sheet of cardboard from which two strips of equal width have been removed. The side of the square sheet is 'a', and 'x' represents the width of the strips cut in centimeters. Find the maximum volume, in liters, of the milk carton in terms of x. Then, find the price of the carton after n years (given below), knowing that it undergoes an inflation of y%, and the original price was 1.20‚Ç¨.

DifficulteFalse.Consigne: A manufacturer is considering the production of cardboard milk cartons. Initially, he has a square sheet of cardboard from which two strips of equal width have been removed. The side of the square sheet is 'a', and 'x' represents the width of the strips cut in centimeters. Find the maximum volume, in liters, of the milk carton in terms of x. Then, find the price of the carton after n years (given below), knowing that it undergoes an inflation of y%, and the original price was 1.20‚Ç¨.
